Reviews.Content: I have a SLR that i love and takes great pics but this Sony has to be one of my favorite on the go cameras i have had,it takes amazing pics and with so many setting option you will have have the correct setting for the environment you are in,My favorite part of this camera is the waterproof under water pics,i took this camera to the Bahamas with me and people were amazed with the quality of pictures this thing took above and under waterThe battery life is amazing and for being out all day away from the hotel it never ran out of battery on me and you know how many pics you take when you are in a new placeThis camera even goes so far to have so many fun filters built into the camera,you can basically add any filter you find in photoshop to any picI would recommend this to anyone looking for a great camera that is waterproof takes amazing pictures and small enough to throw in a pocket or purse

Reviews.Title: New Models? for 2013
Reviews.Author: SD
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX30 just got announced along with a few other cameras. So if you have been holding out for this model, you may want to wait just a little longer. The new model might fix all the problems found on this particular model such as poor water resistance in ports, water seeping into the display, display burnout, and etc. You can check out the new model by searching Sony Cybershot TX30 in the search bar. Sony also announced a few other new point and shoot cameras like the HX300(predecessor:HX200V), WX300(predecessor:WX150, and etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Sony product for those with Kids
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: We bought this because we have kids, rugged and waterproof.  We wanted a simple small point and shoot because lugging around a full Nikon DSLR was annoying.  The water proof feature is completely untested, but liked it as a "just in case" and we did have a camcorder that got shot with a little water at Disney that was never the same after.  Pictures are great thus far, good interface.  The lens being on one side isn't really a big deal, just hold it right and your finger wont be in the shot.  Also because we have kids we wanted a "fast" camera.  This one has a feature to rapid shoot, which can take a bunch of pictures a second.  Be aware that after it's done it must process them which can take a few seconds, so don't let go until you get your shot.  Also if the focus point changes when rapid shooting it will have a few out of focus shots.  Great sony image stabilzation, and a real optical zoom with excellent digital "extension" which is better than most I have seen.  Takes HD video as well, though I haven't tried to burn a clip to bluray and really see the quality, but it tracks kids well and you can even touch the screen to tell it where to focus, and it will follow a moving object with that focus.Excellent camera to take along and capture those moments with kids.  And a peice of mind knowing that it will survive being dropped, and getting a little water on it.Edit: Just came back from Disney.  Excellent pictures, invaluable rapid shot for catching those priceless moments.  Rarely needed a flash (which would need to be off for rapid shot). Even inside it was able to take great pictures with no flash.  Basically if you can still see with sun glasses on it will probably still be able to take a non grainy picture indoors.  Flash was only needed for really dark rides and the princess dinner in Germany.Also it rained everyday as it does in Florida, and we didn't have to worry about the camera!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: imsleepingbeauty
Reviews.Content: works really good . i love it so much. its really worth the price. good to buy it. love it

Reviews.Title: Very good underwaster camera
Reviews.Author: RL
Reviews.Content: I did weeks of research for a good underwater camera the the Sony DSC-TX20 kept coming up as a top performer,well it was excellent. I just came back from a cruise and hit three islands. I was very pleased it did everything it claimed and did it very well. I told everyone in our group that this was a very good choice. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good photos
Reviews.Author: Knerq
Reviews.Content: Love that there's a panorama function. Took photos on the Great Barrier Reef in Australia that came out good, but not as clear or sharp as I had hoped.

Reviews.Title: Great travel sized camera!
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: This camera is essential for family gatherings that photo opportunities could pass by if someone chose to leave the big SLR at home. It fits in a pocket without the bulk of most point and shoot cameras (which is great in a crowd if you don't want to stand out as a target to be pick pocketed). The turn on time is impressive, it surely won't miss any shots due to start up time!

Reviews.Title: So far so good. I love the features of this camera!
Reviews.Author: Rhon
Reviews.Content: I just really think this was an upgrade from my previous camera. I will report any problems, because reviews are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: DSC-TX 20 Review
Reviews.Author: RicardoWolff
Reviews.Content: Perfect!!! I would like to share that in my first day using the camera it happened an accident and it felt from my pocket in the snow. I just realize that I had "lost" my camera 1 hour later. But unfortunately I didn't find the camera. I had to wait until the next day after the snow melted and the camera was still there, without even a scratch or damaged!

Reviews.Title: Cyber-Shot  DSC-TX20 Camera
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Kelley
Reviews.Content: It is pretty complicated to use for someone who is not very savy with electronics.  The only video I made so far did not  go outo my laptop.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: stephano chong
Reviews.Content: pretty good product, lots of features, water proof, shock proof, high pixel, good price, will buy one more. thanks Sony

Reviews.Title: great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Alexander Güntert
Reviews.Content: I believe sony has the best setup of hardware and software to yeld great pictures in point and shoot cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing pics! Love it! Haven't tried under water yet, but hoping it will be just as good when I finally do.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: E. GRANDERSON
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera idealy for our vacation to the Bahamas.  I needed a camera to take pictures of my kids underwater during our vacation, and it does a great job of that.  Although its 12megpix, I compared it to my cannon 10megpix and it was as good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Sickness69
Reviews.Content: I purchased this while it was on sale for $150. It has a great photo quality compared to my last one. If you're looking for a reliable camera this is it!

Reviews.Title: Small & Waterproof
Reviews.Author: A. Solis
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for an adventure trip to Costa Rice. It performed very well both in water and out. The artistic settings took really great pictures. One of the things I really enjoyed was its compact size. Normally we have to take a bulky waterproof and then another thin camera to go out at night. This one both of those cameras in one. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: The best waterproof
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Costa Siqueira
Reviews.Content: The best waterproof camera for your daily entertainment! High resolution, friendly interface, nice effects, best cost x benefits! Don't worry at the beach or pool anymore!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: R. Rivas
Reviews.Content: I have had zero problems with this camera! Highly recommend it! Very portable,very versatile and easy to use. Worth the purchase!

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Not very good picture quality even for a compact camera. Most of my pics come out blurry even after letting it auto focus.  Also, the flash is very bright and your pictures will seem over exposed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Morales "Waynetango"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for xmas.  She used to used a canon elph.  It was very slow and it wasn't giving her the pictures that she expected.  When i gave her this she immediately could tell the difference.  Her pictures are great and she loves that she can take videos of our son.  Added bonus is that it is a rugged model so she doesn't have to get all worried if our 11 month son grabs it and drops it.  Though i did purchase a warranty just in case.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Stu - California
Reviews.Content: Great camera - especially for the price.  Lightweight, small, and water proof.  Pictures came out really good. Like the way it fits in my shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera - great value for money
Reviews.Author: F. Alves
Reviews.Content: We're really impressed so far with this camera. Picture quality is great and it's really quick to turn on and shoot. We bought it on a ski trip and it was fantastic - it did not freeze at all.Its size is great and fits perfectly on my jacket pocket. It's the smaller water proof/ underwater camera I've ever seen! Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera!
Reviews.Author: Wilson A.
Reviews.Content: Wonderful Wonderful Wonderful Wonderful camera! I like it,thanks! Highly recommend to all the people! Thanks a lot to AMZ !

Reviews.Title: Small and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Bargainlady
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Nikon coolpix which stopped charging after 3 years.I was looking for something more sturdy and I think thsi was a good choice.I bought it when it was on special so the price was equivalent to the Nikon.You have to get used to the sliding cover and a few times my finger was covering part of the lense. I got used to it quickly. I am impressed with the quality of close ups.Overall I would recommend it - I really like that it autoomatically discovers the mode it needs and also the multiple focus feature.

Reviews.Title: One Of The Best Purchase I Have Recently Made
Reviews.Author: Lenny Gomez
Reviews.Content: I got it on Special on Amazon for $149, i know that is not the standard price but it was a great deal. Now regarding the actual Camera, it takes amazing pics, I haven't tested it under water but it is truly water proof. Sprinkled water no damage which is awesome. The Pics color is amazing, no blurry pics either, now my final test is the test of time. Lets see how long would it last. The only Bad Thing i could see is that it would get scratch very easily, so make sure if you put in your pockets that you don't have anything sharp or metal.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rolando Baena
Reviews.Content: All items were delivered perfect, everything works ok and all items are new in package original, all it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Christine Iliff
Reviews.Content: So far I haven't tested this underwater so I can't speak to its durability or quality there, but for day to day use I've been very pleased.  It takes sharp pictures and the shutter delay time is very short - much better than my previous camera (an Olympus).  The features are nice without being overwhelming - I've gotten very acceptable results just using the auto settings and movies are sharp.  The standard movie format it uses (Sony proprietary) did not work well with my photo software but I was able to change it to record in mp4 and haven't had a problem since.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Neil Kleinmark
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a few weeks now and must say it is great. I have gone through a number of point and shoot cameras over the last few years and have not been satisfied. I've had cannon, casio, panasonic, and olympus recently. Everyone of them had weaknesses. Some photos were great, but some of them sucked horribly indoors with anything less than tons of lighting. This little sony however has yet to take a bad picture. No, blurr, red eye, poor colors or anything of the sort. Just great pics. If i had to say there is a weakness, it would be the optical zoom of only 4x. Knowing this ahead of time and knowing the intended use the camera would recieve i am fine with it. It seems durable, but time will tell on that i guess. I was pretty worried about the back being touch screen. I usually pass on anything with a touch screen if it isnt made by apple. Apple sets the bar in this area, other phones/tablets/devices just dont compare. This lottle camera is surprisingly good. The touch controls all work perfectly and are trouble free. You really cant go wrong with the tx-20.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: KayKay
Reviews.Content: I am an owner of an SLR, so point and shoots don't impress me. I have had a couple in the past and the picture quality always disappointed me.. hey I have high expectations.  This camera has great picture quality. I took it to the inauguration ball with the President and was able to get some qality shots from a distance.The touch screen is a little annoying, but I am getting used to it. It also has some nice features and the ability to take pics in a range of settings

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Thank you for such a great deal. I would recommend this camera to anyone else. No need for 2 cameras anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not actually waterproof.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Green
Reviews.Content: EDIT: Camera is not waterproof, completely invalidating my previous review.This camera is fantastic, so glad I bought it. Was lugging my dSLR around with me on all of my travels, but realized that since it was too big (and obviously valuable) to take around with me, most of my photos ended up on my iphone. So I bought this camera because it fits into my pocket very well, looks sleek and is waterproof, so I never have to think about whether I should leave it at home because I might be on a beach or in a cave or something.The photos this thing has taken have blown me away, it has actually made me consider stopping my study of photography because the automatic settings on this thing take better photos than I can compose on my dSLR. People look more attractive, food looks incredible, and the auto settings are so good and so fast that once I have it out of my pocket I never miss a shot.Furthermore, this thing always fits well into my pocket and looks enough like a "party camera" to be great for getting shots at a club. People seem to like the slide down thing a lot.Confirmed that it is waterproof by swimming with it in a pool.All in all, it gets the photos I want and takes them better than I could with my dSLR. I'm considering leaving my dSLR behind on my next trip because right now it's just taking up space - I haven't used it since buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, clear photos
Reviews.Author: Nanea
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! I haven't actually used it under water but the normal photos are so bright, clear and crisp. I'm afraid to use it under water but may test it on my next trip to the beach.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for me! I got to record the concert I was at and the sound what great on the download. I haven't tried it in water yet.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: DeeDee
Reviews.Content: Works well in and out of water - A++++! takes great photos, small and pocket sized - would recommend to others!

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
Reviews.Author: mamercs6
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for this point and shoot for years now.  My review won't be very complete as I haven't been in the water with it yet or dropped it from a high height, but the pictures are so clear (even when objects are moving or it's dark).  But this is the first camera (out of 4) that I didn't return after about a month!I love the small size and even though I was hesitant about the touch screen- I am used to it and I actually like it better.  I am an iPhone 5 user and although I am not surprised, I find that I am taking a dozen more pics with the Sony because I know they will not only come out great, but they are so worth printing out and putting in frames.Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: roberto martinez
Reviews.Content: This camera is better than expected. The picture quality is beyond what i expected for a point and shoot camera. The video is remarkably clear and stable. I love it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: V. Guevara
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera! There are so many great features on it and it takes really good low light images which is what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Loves It
Reviews.Author: Connie R. Barthels
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter for Christmas and she loves all the features it has.  She is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: For my 7 year old daughter
Reviews.Author: Molly Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this camera. She takes pictures all the time. Pictures and video look good and seem like it will last. Haven't tested the waterproof and don't intend to.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. It was smaller than I expected. Other than that I love it. It takes get pictures and it is suppose to be waterproof. I haven't tested that aspect of the camera yet.

Reviews.Title: Met my needs!
Reviews.Author: Z. Her
Reviews.Content: Got it for my daughter. Haven't tried the waterproof feature yet but everything else is great. Like the fact that it's very compact but can Stijl deliver hd videos!

Reviews.Title: It is best tool for simple joy
Reviews.Author: kasaha
Reviews.Content: Water proof and HD recording make this camera best tool for simple user. It satisfy me enough to take a picture

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Bearmum05
Reviews.Content: I love this wee camera, it does exactly what it says it will and it fits in my back pocket.  It was great value too oh and my 7yr old uses it too!!!!

Reviews.Title: This is my second!
Reviews.Author: Original Country Girl
Reviews.Content: We bought one last year and I liked it so much, when it was the gold box deal during cyber monday week, I bought another! Clear pictures, easy to use, and very beautiful photos overall.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera.
Reviews.Author: rgbriggs
Reviews.Content: I have no intention of testing its highly touted waterproof features, but I find this to be an intuitive and easy to use device.  The "face" detecting" feature puts a little square around each face it finds and you feel like you're watching "Person of Interest".  It is not fooled by pictures of faces.  Although I hesitate to carry it everywhere since I have my iPhone to take snapshots, when my intention is to take a lot of pictures, this is what I use.  My only disappointment was that what looked like a viewfinder turned out to be the camera lens.

Reviews.Title: Good Product & Price
Reviews.Author: Odysseas J Stamos
Reviews.Content: Good Product & Price. Product was great and at the right price. Glad we bought it! Would absolutely buy again.

Reviews.Title: pleased a picky brother
Reviews.Author: easelqueen "easelqueen"
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to brother - he’s very picky about his cameras. I knew he liked Sony products and took a chance on this great “daily deal”. He claims to be very happy with it, so I’m happy, too.

Reviews.Title: Sony cyber shot DSC-TX20
Reviews.Author: Emilio ampuan
Reviews.Content: The picture sesolution is so cripy clear.. Even low light you could have a clear pictures.I really love it.! Thank for creating this kind of camera, so handy and easy to carry everyWhere.

Reviews.Title: Slim and waterproof AND easy to use
Reviews.Author: K "rmb"
Reviews.Content: This camera fits perfectly in the palm of your hand and in your pants pocket.  It is about the size of a cell phone.  The front slides down and the camera turns "on" and is ready to go.  Slide the front back up, and the camera is "off".  It is auto focus and auto flash.  It is that easy to use!  Working underwater is an added bonus.  We bought this for our daughter who will be at the beach with her band.  Teenagers HAVE to take photos of everything it seems and since her phone isn't waterproof, this is the next best thing.  The photos are clear and sharp.  Definitely worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is excellent!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I took a close up picture on an automatic setting, it didn't turn out, so I just changed the automatic setting on it.. Only error this camera makes is operator error. It takes perfect pictures. I have even moved the camera during a shot and the picture still turned out perfect! It shoots quick, I have yet to miss a shot..

Reviews.Title: Cool and very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Irene Tay
Reviews.Content: I have yet to try the waterproof features but i like the design and features. It is a cool camera, very clear and easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!
Reviews.Author: TaraC.
Reviews.Content: The camera is just like pictured, works perfectly and takes amazing pictures!! Super happy with this buy! Favorite camera ever!! :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect addition
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: We have a really nice DSLR camera and this is the perfect addition to our camera family. It's a great small point and shoot that turns out great pictures.  Haven't used the underwater feature yet, but plan to on a vacation later this year.  With a toddler in the house, you never know when a camera will get dropped in water anyhow.

Reviews.Title: as advertised
Reviews.Author: trihard
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x... Exactly as advertised. Small, lightweight, fits in your pocket

Reviews.Title: Great little point-and-shoot
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: As a photographer, I am very skeptical of anything that does not have a view finder but this camera is a great little point-and-shoot.  It's cousin was my graduation present over 6 years ago and I loved that little camera for as long as it lasted.  I chose to purchase this camera for its focusing abilities, the Ziess optics, and its rugged construction.  Its predecessor met its end at a photo shoot with a baby in a bath tub, so knowing that it is water-proof up to a certain depth is extremely reassuring.I suggest this camera for anyone from the novice pocket photographer to the photo enthusiast or professional with a limited budget.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: kumasan
Reviews.Content: easy to use , nice size to carry , take beautiful pictures, did not try in water yet so I can say nothing about that .

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Mom S
Reviews.Content: Camera takes beautiful pictures and is so user friendly! It's a tiny, compact camera which can even fit in a small pocket! I can't wait to take it on our next vacation and not worry about it getting dropped or wet!

Reviews.Title: it is small and compact
Reviews.Author: Crystalwolf
Reviews.Content: Not too bad for a small, compact camera.  It is easy to work and easy to learn to work. The best part about it is that it fits easily in my pocket

Reviews.Title: People friendly camera
Reviews.Author: sushiguyus
Reviews.Content: This camera will optimize the facial exposures of up to 8 people in various background lighting condition.  The touch screen gives easy and logical access to camera functions.

Reviews.Title: It's GREAT.  Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: PH Cat "Sako"
Reviews.Content: Saving $200 for SONY Cyber shot was amazing.  I have TX5 and thinking of upgrading when this offer showed up.  Lucky for me!

Reviews.Title: Love It! Works very well!
Reviews.Author: Iulia
Reviews.Content: Bought it for special price, worth money.Works under water perfectly in ocean or in the pool.Panoramic view is good

Reviews.Title: Great pictures!  Screen a little sensitive.
Reviews.Author: Tonya R. Brant "TB"
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera.  It takes excellent underwater pics.  I got a lot of great manatee pics in Florida!  And unlike my previous water camera, it does well above water too.  And the video quality is good.  The pictures out of water is decent, but zooming all the way in at something far in the distance (like birds in the top of a tree) is just o.k--not great.  But then, that's not what this camera is really for or why I bought it.  Also, you have to make sure the water droplets are off the lens though or you get a blurry spot.  That's operator error.  I'm learning.  It has a lot of fun features for different types of shots, which I have yet to explore.  I mostly used the smart mode, which did great.  The only part that frustrated me a little is that the screen was a little touchy and the camera is small, so it's very easy to bump the screen and go into a menu without meaning to.  I also highly recommend the Chums camera float, because while this camera is waterproof, it can sink!  This is also available on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great deal for a cool product
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera. It was a gift for my creative daughter and was exactly what I was looking for. Got it as a deal of the day and saved big.  Tons of cool features, light, and very sleek. Only regret was waiting till mid day to order it as all the other color choices were sold out.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: So far camera works great. Haven't tried it underwater yet but everything else is just as it says in product description.

Reviews.Title: Slight blur
Reviews.Author: Toni
Reviews.Content: All the pictures look great on the view screen on the camera, until I put them on my computer then I noticed that many of the pictures have a  blur to them. Not good quality pictures. Unless your going to print all your pictures as wallets then many of them will have a blur. Not too happy. I have not tried any underwater pictures yet.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Carson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girlfriend, she loved it!!  The only flaw with this camera is that it can work slow at times, but still a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great travel camera
Reviews.Author: Barb E
Reviews.Content: Great photo quality, perfect for backpacking and still capturing as close to a DSLR as I have found in a point and shoot. Easy!

Reviews.Title: It's so so..
Reviews.Author: Guknam Shim
Reviews.Content: This item is so so.Price is good, but not include carrying case.Also System UI can't support Korean, Japanese...

Reviews.Title: Great for deal price
Reviews.Author: RChapman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this around Christmas at a big discount. Once I got it, I realized that I would have paid double. The pictures I've taken are great looking. The camera has a lot of setting and is very easy to use. I'm not sure how water proof and rugged it will be but I will find out soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: Gourav Dewangan
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera - very Small but has multiple features - still trying to get my arms around the advance features.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-TX20
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Great camera, perfect photos. Best for travel.Fast focusing, HD video look sharp, Good sound fits every where . battery life is long get the extra battery its worth it .A+

Reviews.Title: amazing quality
Reviews.Author: jc2487
Reviews.Content: this camera has amazing clarity...especially at night...and great features. I have not tested it underwater yet. fully satisfied thus far after a week

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Rj math
Reviews.Content: So far camera works great. Haven't tried it underwater yet but everything else is just as it says in product description.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x Zoom
Reviews.Author: MsPop
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived quickly. It's waterproof, but that wasn't my reason for purchasing. I go through at least a camera a year because they all lose focus, possibly because they are carried in a purse and jostled about quite a biit. This camera is advertized as shockproof. I used it for the first time yesterday and was pleased with the size (smaller than a smartphone) and ease of use. Only time will tell about the shockproof part..

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: David Weston Lanning
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, Love all the features and really loved the price ($150 dollar deal)!The only down side is that it does not have built in WIFI.

Reviews.Title: Sony TX20 Great Camera, but average picture quality
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very disapointingThe functionality and ease of use is good, butZoom quality is not great!

Reviews.Title: High expectations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper "vip"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because i am madly in love with  its predecessor TX10. I have high expectations for it based on the performance of the older model.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: gabent
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my wife and even though she has one very similar this camera has some great features the other does not.  It's waterproof, dustproof and shockproof from a fall above arms height.  That was some of the great reasons for gaining my attention to it, but the features inside really got me to buy it.  With a smart smile capture to being able to capture an image in motion and bieng able to correct a blur is just two reasons.  My wife loves the touch screen and the ability to change the hues and colors right on the camera is her thrill.  She loves the fact that she can make features "pop" after she takes the photo to enaable her to manipulate the photo before it is show to anyone.  For a point and shoot camera, it has alot of features that a big and bulky DSLR has, but with a very slim and compact size.  Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera but get a screen protector
Reviews.Author: Indigogirl1976
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera. It takes excellent shots. However, buy a screen protector...I scratched the screen on day 1 as it is so sensitive. I got some protectors on eBay. Great little camera otherwise.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal
Reviews.Author: S. Daily
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Sony Cyber-Shot underwater camera during a Gold Box deal. If it comes around again buy it. It is very good, the underwater pictures are very good and this is the purpose for the purchase. I am satisfied. $149.99 don't miss the deal.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Hill "Sheek"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures and is small and lightweight.  I have taken pictures in the sun, snow, at kids events and in the pool.  I was also impressed with the pictures it took in the pool but the camera stopped working (bad seam) and I had to return it (hence the 4 stars).  The next time I am in the water I will update the review once I have retested it in the water.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Pedro Vicentin
Reviews.Content: Its a very good cameraits best underwater, didnt liked too much the photos outside the water..but it works good

Reviews.Title: this camera is awes...
Reviews.Author: Zep "Sparrow"
Reviews.Content: the first is that i got it 4 a lowest price ever seen 4 this camera.The camera shoots very nice pictures in low light ,the Full hd video needs a lot of energy so you may get 50 minutes of recording before the battery die, which its fine 4 a little battery,get other battery 4 back up,If you decide to buy it you'll be very happy

Reviews.Title: Cheap great resolution
Reviews.Author: Extzy
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great, great low light performance, and quick to turn on and activate. Will do some more testing!

Reviews.Title: solids performance, tiny footprint
Reviews.Author: A. Kim
Reviews.Content: bought this as a gift for my sister.  its an upgrade on the old tx10 model which i had and loved.  the panoramic feature is the best on the market i think.  and its great that its so slim.  more of a fashion camera with a bit of waterproofing, i never considered this as the most rugged camera.  my old tx10 model held up for 2 years at the beach so i imagine this will do as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Russell McDonald
Reviews.Content: Works great. My wife loves it. Have not tried the waterproof aspect yet (not ready to toss it in the water), but it did survive a fall to the floor without any effect.

Reviews.Title: I've stopped using my phone for photos now.
Reviews.Author: Laura Henderson
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome pics in every setting. I've noticed that in dim light and very bright light it automatically adjusts for the perfect pic. I have used a few of the features such as the instant red-eye remover, the painting effect filter and the panoramic setting and all are amazing. One drawback to the panoramic feature is that you have to have bright lighting for it to work. I love that this camera switches to the macro setting automatically for close up shots and can get super close and detailed. I bought it for the waterproof aspect but haven't had a chance to try it yet. I carry this camera with me everywhere and use it rather than my phone now because of the picture quality. I will be purchasing a wi-fi card for it so that I don't have to remove the card to download the photos each time.

Reviews.Title: Water and Snow resistant
Reviews.Author: Dharmesh K. Gnansivam "Dharmesh"
Reviews.Content: I have tried this with underwater, it gives great picture and also i tried during snow time, and its really durable and resistant for water, dust ,etc.,I got it in amazon gold box deal, it was a great deal, Thank you amazon

Reviews.Title: Many Creative Options
Reviews.Author: Chel
Reviews.Content: I also snagged this camera on the $149 deal, so I feel like for that price I would recommend this camera, but I wouldn't pay more. The major concern I have is that the manual only tells you how to insert battery, charge, and upload pictures from the camera. There are so many features and options for this camera, but I can't find any place online that actually describes them. For example, there is a miniature mode - well, I took a picture, it's blurry, but what did it do? Some are a little more obvious, like black and white, color features, etc. but it would be so much more user friendly if it explained all the options. It's a little harder to hold while zooming than any other camera I had, but the touch screen is fabulous for searching through pictures and finding the settings you want for your picture. It does have smile and blink detection which are awesome for taking pictures of my children, and it focuses quickly which is why I bought this camera.  Pleased with my purchase but would have loved to have better instruction manual so I could take full advantage of all the features.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Shana Gilman
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with the quality of photos this little camera takes. I had no idea that such a compact camera could take such nice pictures. It is very well designed, with a clean and durable structure. It is compact, attractive, user-friendly, and highly-functional!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: great camera really gets the job done in every aspect. Got for my wife for christmas and got it two days before.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Ron Maines
Reviews.Content: I got this as a present for my wife during the one-day special pricing.  We go on trips that involve outdoor adventure, such as sun, sand, ocean or snow, and our other cameras always end of up with problems. This should do much better with all its features.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Luciano Sumiyoshi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted a resistent camera. And so far this model does not disappointed me. Despite I never get it wet kkk.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Takes high quality pictures in and out of water. I used it on a recent snorkel trip to Mexico and for night time photos.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: sadie mae 212
Reviews.Content: At first I was surprised at the smalll size.  This is my first digital camera.  As an artist, I use film  with great results.  I did have a problem, however with the color reproduction in the images when i photographed some of my paintings.  The colors are not true, but this is to be expected with an inexpensive camera.  On the whole it is a lot of fun!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: I.N.
Reviews.Content: Very small and takes super pictures, it looks like a normal camera not an bulky underwater type.  The movie mode is simple to use too.

Reviews.Title: Nice and awesome product
Reviews.Author: alok rai
Reviews.Content: I like this camera coz it's small so easy to carry anywhere in the pocket. Something I was looking for long time. Happy with the picture quality and the flash is awesome. Day and night picture quality is awesome too. Overall a great product and good buy.

Reviews.Title: Paid for used but looks brand new to me!
Reviews.Author: Tyan Podolski
Reviews.Content: Previous owner of a TX5 so I already knew I loved the style and features of the camera.  In addition, all the accessories are interchangeable between models such as the battery, charger, float strap etc.  I appreciate that the slide cover has a subtle texture.  I was disappointed when all the paint flaked off my TX5 after its first swim. I think the texture will help prevent that on this model.  Apprears to be just as tough too.  I had no reservations about letting a 3 year old run around with it recently.  Got some great feet shots!  And also lots of pictures of little fingers as the lens is right where you would normally hold the camera.  Takes some practice to avoid.  The flash on this model tends to wash everything out, so generally I turn the flash off and use low light or back light settings.  As with the TX5, there is some lag time capturing an image in low light.  Of some concern, is the battery compartment door which appears to bow slightly when closed.  It is not completely flush with the body of the camera like the HDMI access door is.  So far it has been waterproof, but I snorkle often and I worry about extended periods in the water.  I purchased this camera used to minimize any potential loss in the event of water damage.  I was impressed when it showed up wrapped in all the original packaging and box.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: W. LOVO "Wilbur"
Reviews.Content: this camera is amazing great picture quality and video. nice touch screen. definetly a camera i will have for years.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Candy Soung
Reviews.Content: This has got to be one of the best cameras I've purchased. The pictures are crystal clear! I can't tell you much about the underwater capabilities it has because I'm too scared to do it :( If you have big fingers or hands this might not be the camera for you. I have better small hands hand it's hard for me to press some of the buttons.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP
Reviews.Author: Artem "REDNERD"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my parents as a gift because their camera was just a cheap little thing that rarely made good pictures. Right out of the box - i must say this camera is VERY easy to use. It felt well in hand (solid). The touchscreen menus were rather intuitive and neither I or my parents had any difficulty in figuring out how to adjust settings. The pictures were beautiful to start with (Auto) - with some minor tweaks you can get them to look the way you want them if you're not happy with the auto mode.I have no plans in trying it under water just yet - but ability of this camera to withstand weather will surely help when my parents go places. They are always concerned that the camera will get a little wet or that the send will get into it.I bought this camera as 'deal of the day' for $150. In my opinion it was worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: best!
Reviews.Author: LUIS ENRIQUE CASTRO
Reviews.Content: i love it!  The size is perfect to fit in the pocket. Excellent camera, very light and practical. and good price.

Reviews.Title: Nice an Stylish
Reviews.Author: Daniel Chancusi
Reviews.Content: The size is perfect to fit in the pocket. Clear images and very nice and artistic filters to apply to the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera during an amazon deal - so I only paid $140 for it. I'm still getting used to it and learning how to use all the features - but there are a ton of shooting options and is pretty intuitive - once you get over all the options (fireworks, snow, beach, underwater, pets, gourmet, soft, superior, 3D, toy camera, etc etc etc...)! I love that its waterproof too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pipa
Reviews.Content: Found the best option was a good price. I recommendExcellent camera, very light and practical.For my is the better

Reviews.Title: Big things come in small packages
Reviews.Author: tookool2c
Reviews.Content: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Blue) (2012 Model)What an impressive little camera, loaded with features and rugged to boot. I received this camera as a gift from my husband and I can honestly say it is one of the best cameras I've owned, definitely the best point-and-shoot camera I have seen. You might consider my opinion biased because we love Sony cameras, but I own JVC and Kodak cameras as well and this tiny gadget holds its own right next to my old dinosaur Sony Mavica. Blows away all my other cameras in quality and also the HD and 3D capabilities that come with this Sony are the cherry on top. Creative images come easy with all of the settings available at your fingertips.WATERPROOF, Takes gorgeous photos under water. Just make sure to keep your seals clean of any debris and closed and locked tight, no worries! I tested it in my 120 gallon aquarium and also took some fantastic photos of the Christmas gathering we had today, it was so easy to capture every smile and special moment when it comes on at the flick of a finger and is easily fit in any pocket.Would recommend the DSC-TX20 to any amateur photographer who enjoys capturing family moments,Nature,or awesome fishing pictures,I know I am really anticipating using it at all these spring fed rivers here in the Ozarks next year.Thanks again Sony, for great quality photographs in an easy to use little wallop of a camera. And thank you, Amazon, for the 57% off price we scored it at. :]

Reviews.Title: Highly Impressive
Reviews.Author: Ricardo ""Real Name""
Reviews.Content: For the size of the unit you are concerned about how it is supposed to survive a fall, let alone work underwater. Suffice it to say it was incredible under water snorkling, and we were able to clearly video a ray swimming underneath. Takes excellent panoramic pictures as well - no downsides so far.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT POINT AND SHOOT!!!!
Reviews.Author: George L. J. Miller
Reviews.Content: I got this at a one day sale before the holidays and sold my Fuji XP50 and am happy that I upgraded!!!!!  12MP JPEG images which are larger than the RAW images I got with my old Canon Rebel XS DSLR, which use about 9-10 MP per uncompressed image.  Excellent detail and focus all the way to the infinity point.  I love the easy to use menus and the HDR setting is the best I seen yet, very accurate to the results I get with Photoshop without all the hassle and mess.  This camera is perfect to take along if one wants to get excellent results and needs them fast and easy.  Focuses even faster than my old DSLR.

Reviews.Title: In love with camera
Reviews.Author: Junior
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera, the only down fall to this camera is that it doesn't have a good zoom but everything else on the camera is good. It is definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: No Need for Expensive Camera; This Works Better!
Reviews.Author: ConsumerReport
Reviews.Content: I got this camera on a lightening deal for about $150.  It's exactly the price that made me jump on it instead of investing in a expensive camera that I'd be afraid to take with me into outdoors where I like to go.  I needed a camera to take photos of every day stuff while I'm out in the woods or around family.  So I need a camera that I can carry with me all the time and not worry about it getting bumped or scratched.I took this thing into the Indiana woods two days after I received; it poured rain for nearly 3 hours.  No problems with rain there or while walking the wet streets of DC.  So far it's done pretty good with the wet stuff.  I did transfer mud to the camera while in the woods, I've yet to get that all out of the little nooks and crannies around buttons.I really like this camera a lot and would recommend it to anyone needing a really nice point and shoot or need one with waterproof & shockproof features.Pros:Small (It's smaller than your cell phone and takes way better pics)Waterproof (Great in the Rain, haven't tried submerging it yet)Quick - From the moment you slide it open to pic number 1 then 2 ..., it's really fast.Various Modes - HDR, 3D, and many othersRemembers Last Setting Used - Once you slide it open, it has your last setting ready.Touch Screen - Really pretty niceBattery - Charges fairly quick, lasts a long time (I've drained it twice in DC after all day shooting; modes like HDR I'm sure require the battery work harder as I think the battery would last longer if I didn't shoot in those modes all the time.)Cons:Slider - I find that it doesn't slide open easy, it's not difficult, but with one had, the smallness of the camera prevents you from sliding it open if it's not positioned properly with you fingers.  Your fingers, if on top, don't assist the downward action of the slider, but rather seem to only be pushing the top of the narrow camera when one handing it. Also if dirt, like mud, gets under the slider, it's hard to know if that gets cleaned as I can't tell if it comes off.Lens - it is a bit too close to the left and the fingers on that hand that are not holding the camera can find themselves hanging into the frame. (you'll adjust to this in time)I am so pleased with this little camera.  The photos are coming out very good for a point and shoot.  Having it do that and be water and shock proof is just great!

Reviews.Title: Works fine!
Reviews.Author: Osman M.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip and I needed to take pictures in the water, I'm glad with this one, the pictures are great and works fine in the water.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! Camera is much better that W690
Reviews.Author: BearbullMM
Reviews.Content: I just received my camera today and took about 50 photos at various distance/zoom and the photos are crisp and colors are vibrant.  Waiting to go on my Key West trip and use in the water :)

Reviews.Title: Fabulous camera
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: In my opinion, Sony makes the best point and shoot camera. I used to have a Kodak and I thought the flash always washed me out. Sony's Cybershot takes excellenet photos and I really like the design of the settings and menu system overall. This camera is super durable and streamlined. I would recommened this camera to anyone. I am so happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: WLS
Reviews.Content: I have absolutely loved this camera! It takes excellent pictures even underwater. Amazing clarity and very easy to use. I'm very hard on my camera because I take it everywhere and already dropped it several times (which was the demise of my last camera). All the drops have not messed up the functioning, though a few scratches have shown up on the blue outside. The video quality is also exceptional. This was definitely a worthy purchase!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely recommend it
Reviews.Author: Popi
Reviews.Content: This camera takes fantastic images underwater as well as in the air. The panoramic images and film quality are excellent. It has many options for low light, speed, effects to take B&W; images highlighting specific colors of preference, etc. I snorkeled a lot with it and never had any problem.  It has a slim light design that fits in any pocket. I highly recommend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Design Problems make this camera medium of the road
Reviews.Author: David M. Draper
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera a few months now and used it under a variety of conditions.The quality of pictures and videos is very good. I own an DSLR so this camera gets limited use. So far I am happy with however there are some negative design aspects that make this a meddle of the road camera at best.The camera was purchased specifically because it was waterproof. The idea was to use it in the boat and to use it in our pool. The first camera lasted about 2 weeks before the seals leaked and water got into it. Amazon was very good replacing the camera however the seals should not have leaked. No problems so far with the replacement however I do have a lot of confidence in the seals lasting a long time,There is no view finder. You must use the display to compose and frame the picture. In the bright sun the display is very difficult to see so composing and framing the picture is almost impossible.The lens is in upper left hand corner of the camera very close to the edge. Due to the position of the lens and when you have it with no zoom (widest angle) it is very easy to get your fingers in the picture if you don't pay attention to how you grip the camera. This normally might not be an issue however it becomes and an issue when you can't see the display and don't have a view finder to frame the picture.The bottom line is, would I buy this camera again after using it a few months. I doubt it.

Reviews.Title: Defected product terrible customer service buy the Panasonic lumix!
Reviews.Author: gregory f. miller
Reviews.Content: This Camera broke on SECOND day of use.  The Touch screen froze.  I did not drop the camera, open the seals nor mishandle the product in any fashion.  Unfortunately i was unable to use the camera for the rest of my vacation.  I Called customer service- they were absolutely awful.  Beware! THEY WERE UNWILLING TO REPLACE THE DEFECTIVE PRODUCT!!  Do not waste your money- such an expensive camera should function more than two days.  Buy the Panasonic lumix (which has a better design for an underwater camera) or the fujifilm Xp instead.  Those worked for my friends the entire duration of the trip.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x
Reviews.Author: Myron Buczkowski
Reviews.Content: Original camera that was shipped would charge and it wouldn't charge, took it to the beach on Kaui and before my great nephew could use it the camera would turn on and off.Too expensive,too delicate. I will stick with Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: jkps
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this camera but found it to take too long to focus on the subject before it captures the picture. I missed several moments due to the unit attempting to auto focus. When I tried to bypass the auto focus, the picture came out blurry.I did like the semi-touch screen. You are able to shuffle through pictures pretty quickly but not much else can be done via touch.I did not get to use the camera's waterproof feature as I decided to return. At this price point I should be completely happy with the camera and I wasn't.

Reviews.Title: Not durable in the slightest
Reviews.Author: ETHAN D SMITH
Reviews.Content: Camera sent in to Sony for repair due to cracked case, without dropping it!Camera repaired and sent back.  Within 3 months the case was cracked in the same spot without dropping it!Sony refused to repair due to warranty period.Thumbs down to Sony Tx10 (water damage), TX20 (2x cracked without dropping).  Would you buy a TX30?  I wouldn't!

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: spendingmoneyman
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE FREAKING BEST WATERPROOF CAMERA ON THE MARKET THAT I KNOW OF SO FAR. You can tell by the reviews here! Over one hundred great reviews and only 17 bad ones. That speaks for itself but because this camera has performed so well I had to say a little bit about it.I live in hawaii and go adventuring all the time. I've run this camera extremely hard for 2 years hiking, snorkeling, swimming, jumping off of cliffs, and throwing it around. This is one tough little camera. Never leaked once or built up any kind of moisture behind the screen or lens.The camera itself takes great photos and has an ultra wide angle lens. The full HD videos are excellent and the sound quality is decent. The coolest feature is that it doesn't look like an average waterproof camera with weird obtrusive designs. This allows you to go clim a mountain, swim in a waterfall but right after take it to a dinner party and blend right in.The only minor cons I'd have to point out is that there is not very much optical zoom on it and the touch screen operation doesn't work when your hands get to cold swimming.Definitely worth the money and gets to job done! Stop your search and buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Deal of the day was right!
Reviews.Author: jmess
Reviews.Content: Got this on the deal of the day and it was the best $ I've spent in a long time.  Took it to the beach and the tourists with their huge Cannons (you know the ones who wear them around their neck at all time, even walking down the beach in a Speedo) were confused when I ran into the ocean with it on my wrist.  I even got crafty with it and took videos whileon the zip-line!

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Aaron Miner
Reviews.Content: First time I took this camera into the pool, it stopped working. Both the battery compartment seal as well as the USB seal failed.

Reviews.Title: Deal of the Day, I'll say
Reviews.Author: L. Williams "Paddle foot"
Reviews.Content: Another Unbelievable, Deep Cut, Unhealable Discount of a Deal from Amazon!I can't believe the DEAL I got on this Sony Camera from Amazon. Perhaps it was only for ME as a kinda make-up for delivering a couple of packages late or something. I am and was totally happy with Amazon already for delivering packages EARLY in some instances, but this! This takes the cake. Amazon had sometimes delivered in 1 day rather than the 2 days they promised. That was pretty good and all, but their Daily Deals have got to be the greatest things since sliced Meat! 1/2 off on 1000 dollar items or 1/3 price for couple hundred dollar items. I am so going to hate next summer when Amazon will start charging TAX for items sold in Virginia. Amazon is my #2 place to shop right now. 1st is groceries and #2 is for everything else non edible, though I see that they actually sell food stuff as well. Anyways, back to this Camera. I already own a Fujifilm XP waterproof (resistant) camera. I bought it last year to take to Water Country U.S.A. (Bush Garden's Water Park) for taking pictures in the pools etc with my kids. I also own a regular SONY Cyber-Shot and am happy with it. The DSC-TX20 is a higher resolution than the FUJI and has more picture taking features, the same as my other Cyber-SHot. It has the features the FUJI has except the Sony has a Touch Screen and can play Music too. Pretty soon these Cameras will make toast and coffee as well as take pictures. I totally recommend this Camera as a decent purchase if you plan to swim and need pictures in the water. Only buy it on sale though. It's not too cheap at full MSR. WHile I'm at it I want to kiss Amazon's butt again. This is my second year as a Prime member with them. I have definitely made up the price of membership with the savings I received on shipping and as if that  weren't good enough they also have a Movie service akin to Netflix which Prime Members can enjoy with a huge variety of no charge movies. Merry Holidays and I wish you the Best of New Years Amazon. Thank you for all the unbelievable Deals you have given to me and my Family throughout the year and for years in the past.Sincerely,Will

Reviews.Title: Good features but a little pricey
Reviews.Author: Philip Yuan
Reviews.Content: The camera has very nice features as described in the product description, but I did not have a occasion to use it in the water yet.  The built-in instruction (when you touch the '?' symbol on the display) is very useful.  The battery between charges seems to run shorter than expected.  The camera size is small but the photo quality is good (with a wide-angle side effect though)  The only negative feeling is that it is a little pricey, comparing to other small cameras.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  Because of its small size, I take it almost everywhere.  It's waterproof, dustproof, and shockproof features are perfect for a camera that I'll use exclusively for hiking and backpacking.  Yet it's good looking enough to use everywhere!  I'm still getting used to the small touch screen and still learning about all the great features of the DSC-TX20.  I paid $298 for the black color and it shipped from Amazon.  The DSC-TX20 replaces my previous camera (Pentax Optio H90) that my son talked me into giving him.  I'm definitely not going to give him this one!!

Reviews.Title: Incredible Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Highlander
Reviews.Content: Not only is it really waterproof, it takes fantastic action shots. My kids are never, ever still but I've been catching amazing action shots with this tiny little camera that I would struggle to capture on my D-SLR. ..and, oh yeah, my D-SLR can't go in the lake with me.

Reviews.Title: Basically disappointed
Reviews.Author: D. A. Weaver "Tenspot"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after a series of unfortunate thefts of cameras I really enjoyed using.  I almost wish this Sony camera would be stolen.  I use it for taking photographs while running trails and running marathons and it is just not very good. The camera is slow, the quality of the photos are not excellent. I often get frustrated when I turn it on and have to deal with a series of announcements about how to use the camera properly...I need the camera immediately to grab images on the go.This camera is very poor for that.  I am very disappointed. I will not get another one.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Patty B "pattyb52"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift.  Was happy with the picture quality and compact size.  But the first time I put it in water...was the last.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Marcia Stahovich
Reviews.Content: Love the camera, charging big issue, plug to output very weak. Unable to charge battery or get pics from camera after less than 3 month use. Big flaw.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE of recurring issue!
Reviews.Author: H. Yang
Reviews.Content: **First off, let me summarize my review:+ good pictures+ nice design+ waterproof- problematic touch screenPROBLEM-----------After merely 4 months, very little use, and extreme care with it, the plastic bezel/frame around the screen cracked without any known impact. A piece about 5mm long came off, leaving the adjacent portions loose. As disappointed as I was, I didn't think it would be an issue with other people's cameras, as I had done lots of reading of reviews here on Amazon. But surprisingly, I met up with a friend over a weekend, and she had the same exact problem! She actually had multiple fractures, and had to resort to superglue to hold it together. One of the cracks is in the EXACT same location as mine!She said she had returned the camera twice for repair for the same issue until the warranty ran out. I called up Sony for repair, but they wouldn't guarantee free repair as it could be "physical damage". I also had to actually talk to the rep for 30 min in order to convince him to agree to send me a pre-paid envelope. I just got off the phone and will wait for the envelope. Will try to update this review as I progress with repairs.

Reviews.Title: Under water pics
Reviews.Author: Tedra Kirby
Reviews.Content: This camera is really nice. It is small n sleek. The underwater pics are so crystal clear! The reaction time is also great.Lots of features, definitely a nice buy.

Reviews.Title: Not what I spected
Reviews.Author: cucho
Reviews.Content: I cant connect it to my tv and wash the videos from the camera I try the hdmi cable but no results.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Lauralee Minneman
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying this camera and ended up choosing this one as the reviews were pretty good, people said the lens is awesome, it was within my price range, and it's water and dust resistant. Once I got it I started taking pictures like crazy to test it out and I have to say I was pleasantly surprised. The colors are almost always vivid, it does a great job in the auto function on focusing (even on moving subjects), and retains a good deal of detail. The auto function will automatically adjust itself depending on what you are shooting - low light, portrait, macro, etc. - and it hasn't failed me yet. I am a somewhat experienced photographer and have a DSLR, but I wanted a good point and shoot for convenience.The only other function I have really messed with is the video, which I was kind of disappointed with as the quality is not great. That is why I took off one star. But for me the video is not that big of a deal because I have a good video camera I can use if I feel like taking good quality video. But this camera would be fine to use on video if need be.To sum it up, this camera is perfect to use for every day picture taking! Easy enough for even the most beginner photographer. I should mention the touch screen is kind of sensitive so you have to be careful when holding the camera so as to not accidentally change the settings without knowing it. But again, to me this is not a big deal. Hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Photos
Reviews.Author: N. Meehan
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing photographs and is very easy to use.  However, we've had a couple of Sony cameras, and they don't last forever.  But for the price, this camera is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera when it works!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Renteria
Reviews.Content: I took the camera on a 7 day cruise and I have great under/ over water pictures. But at the of the trip the battery when out.I would recommend it with a great warranty

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, easy to use, SOMEWHAT water proof
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Phenomenal camera for the price. Takes great pictures under water. Used to go snorkeling and was able to take about 200 photos under water. However, water did get in it and the camera died. So i guess when they mean waterproof i guess its for accidents and not full fledged underwater photography

Reviews.Title: I ended up returning this.
Reviews.Author: rhodnius
Reviews.Content: Pros: Slim, stylish and compact.Cons: The picture quality was not good. Most of the pictures looked like they were taken from a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Esectacular!
Reviews.Author: David Obando
Reviews.Content: La camara es espectacular! Las funciones que brinda la camara permiten tomar fotos únicas. Muy buena calidad de la camara. La pantalla tactil, es muy buena. Tengo una Sony Tx9, y la pantalla tactil de la Tx20 es mucho mejor. No lo pienses dos veces, compra esta camara.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: tdehoff
Reviews.Content: The camera takes resonably okay pictures but the documentation that came is complety useless.  No software with it so I can use it without a time consuming download.  (I don't have high speed internet and its time consuming and expensive to download what they should have packaged with the product) .  Your finger is constantly getting into the image since the lens is too close to the top left corner where you hold the camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP
Reviews.Author: steve robinson
Reviews.Content: It's small and comfortable camera.Design is perfect. I like sony digital camera.And it has waterproof, shockproof digital cameraThese functions are that I will want to get it!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Christian Steve Andrade Mesia
Reviews.Content: me encanto el producto y lo recibi sin ninguna novedad, excelente, lo estoy utilizando sin ninguna novedad, recomiendo este producto

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shop
Reviews.Author: Chester A. Sienko Jr.
Reviews.Content: Just as I expected.  Great!  Delivered timely and a great price.  Right size and fit like it should.  Happy Camper.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: Love my sony green camera.  It takes great picture and fits in my case just right.  Sony products are the best.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: I. Laparan "StunnerVy"
Reviews.Content: i haven't tried to use this under water coz i'm scared it will break but so far i love the quality of the pictures and it's a handy camera. if you love going places, this would be perfect for you and it's touch screen, waterproof and shock proof so it's a good deal :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: E. D. Saubier
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It is easy to use.  Takes great pictures.  Small, so it is easy to take on trips.  The video quality is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Sony
Reviews.Author: Rudy Widjaja "Rudy Widjaja"
Reviews.Content: I don't think there is a good rugged or waterproof camera.This one is no exception.The image it capture has color bleed and only good at outdoor scene.Underwater, meh. You better not dip this one

Reviews.Title: Not water proof
Reviews.Author: chechobosio
Reviews.Content: The camera is nice, the picture quality quite good, but, I took it underwater, less than 5 feet, and its insides where flooded And the camera ruined

Reviews.Title: Too pricey for whats offered
Reviews.Author: K. Tsai
Reviews.Content: Besides the price, i also find the anti shake mechanics not functioning as I expected.Its not too bad, but for the price, i'd rather have a non-waterproof camera with better picture quality and a waterproof one just for the occasion (which is not that often at all)

Reviews.Title: Still yet to dig in and use much of its features
Reviews.Author: FB
Reviews.Content: This camera seems to be as advertised for the most part. The quality of the video and images are great/pretty good. There are a lot of options that I have to master. Low light images do not look very well when viewed on a monitor screen, but it's still a just point and shoot camera. It's pretty darn good for what it is and being a waterproof camera at that. I still have yet to experiment with it in water, but will be soon since I am going on a cruise next week to Cozumel (which is a big reason for my purchase). There are several TX20 videos (and even one of the TX10, the older model) of amazing underwater scenes of tropical fish on coral reefs. I can't wait to try it out.Packaging from this seller, Adorama Camera, was pretty bad. I used the normal USPS 3-5 day shipping. The camera came inside it's small Sony camera box inside a thin, standard plastic bag tightly sealing in the aformentioned box. This means that all shock was absorbed directly to a single, small box containing the camera. This was not something I expected. There are better shipping methods than the one used for this. A medium/small box with the camera box inside with filling (bubble wrap or shipping peanuts) would have been ideal.

Reviews.Title: wrong cable
Reviews.Author: Alice C. White
Reviews.Content: The cable for recharging had the wrong size connector to the camera and we were unable to find a replacement cable for it.

Reviews.Title: Very great product and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Stephen Lamar Smith
Reviews.Content: I took away a sttar because the item was shipped two days late, and came the day before the trip I planned to use it on.

Reviews.Title: Multipurpose camera
Reviews.Author: Karen E. Heiser
Reviews.Content: Great, lightweight, easy to use camera.  Appreciate it being water proof even just for use on beach.  Not ready to use since no memory card included.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: This is an excelent camara. , affordable price, and very product by Sony, I recommend it to anyone who likes photography as me.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: girl a
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera December 13 of 2012.  the first time I used it I went to remove the camera from my back pocket by using the wristlet and the wristlet BROKE OFF of the camera.  I called sony and they covered it under warranty and I received my "new" camera at the end of February 2013. I went to use this "new" camera on vacation, I dropped the camera from a height of less than 2 feet (it states that it is shock proof from up to 5 feet) and it SHATTERED the lens. I just called sony regarding this product that is so sensitive I have to be careful making scary faces at it and they told me that the camera will not be covered under warranty because it is shock proof, not impact resistant. They were unable to tell me what "shock proof" means to them, the only thing I can imagine is that you can not yell at the camera, make funny faces, or other wise get a reaction from the camera.  They did say that they would replace the 95 day old camera for $130.00.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY on this product as it is very fragile and must be handled with the greatest amount of care in order to not be broke.

Reviews.Title: Died. Used NEAR the beach.
Reviews.Author: P. Hopper
Reviews.Content: Supposedly waterproof camera was bought for vacation pics on the beach. It never was used underwater. It was never in ocean spray. It was just used on a windy day on the beach and it has never worked again.Luckily, I can afford my loss.

Reviews.Title: Best in its Class
Reviews.Author: Thumper
Reviews.Content: Highest mega pixelBest zoom button ,it wont hurt your finger in 5 secondsThe smallest in classSony lets you know your camera from a manual that comes with the camera.The camera has its own manual inside.Its software the playback functions are custom.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Thao T. Ha
Reviews.Content: I'VE HAVE BOUGHT MANY SONY CAMERAS IN THE PASSED AND WAS ALWAYS HAPPY WITH THEIR PRODUCTS EXPECT THIS ONE.BOUGHT THIS CAMERA FOR MY CANCUN TRIP. WE WERE DOING A LOT OF UNDER WATER ACTIVITIES AND I WANTED TO CAPTURE THOSE MEMORIES. THE CAMERA LASTED ONE DAY. TOOK IT SNORKELING, FOLLOWED ALL DIRECTIONS. AFTER A LONG DAY OF SNORKELING WENT BACK TO MY HOTEL, TRIED TO TURN MY CAMERA ON..THE GREEN LIGHT WAS ON BUT MY SCREEN WAS BLANK. SO THE WHOLE TRIP I WAS LEFT WITHOUT A CAMERA. REALLY DISAPPOINTED. TOTALLY RUIN MY TRIP. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!!

Reviews.Title: What I was looking for
Reviews.Author: funstuff
Reviews.Content: Have not had the oppurtunity to use yet that is why 4 stars.  But it was packed well, received on time.  Hope it works out well on my Grand Canyon rafting trip.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but .....
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I haven't tested the camera very much but I really like it so far.  I took great video in a lit garage at night time and came out very clear.  I am a little nervous about the sliding panel.  It seems kind of thin and if it catches on something it seems like it could be bent easily.

Reviews.Title: OMG 54% OFF
Reviews.Author: PrivateSecurityContractor "PersonalProtection...
Reviews.Content: I can't believe it!!! I just purchased this with a 54% discount price so low i couldnt pass up on. Ive seen this camera in bestbuy and its really3x nice. lowprofile and waterproof are the two important features I was after. The shockproof and dustproof features I could use sometime in the future when I deploy overseas again. The touchscreen part makes it really classy. I also got free shipping. NICE!!!UPDATE:Just checked the price and it's back to msrp value. actually just $1 off now. I'm glad I stole this deal.

Reviews.Title: my 12-year-old loves this
Reviews.Author: Karen Wisnia
Reviews.Content: My husband did a lot of research before choosing this camera.  We're still getting used to using it.  I has a ton of features and we love that it can go underwater.  My 12-year-old loves this.  We used birthday money to purchase this for her.  And we also used Discover Cash back money.  That was really helpful.

Reviews.Title: Broke on it's first day
Reviews.Author: bmcarat
Reviews.Content: Got it for a trip i made. First day I took nice pictures and shot nice videos. When I got home, it just wouldn't turn on again. If the camera was plugged in a power outlet, a orange or yellow light came on by the power button, but nothing happened.Returned it to amazon. Waiting for the replacement to write another review.

Reviews.Title: crappy pictures, bad battery life
Reviews.Author: Erik Sun
Reviews.Content: very awful battery life on video. the reason I bought this was because it's shockproof andbut the picture quality is bad.  I'd buy this if you need a 1080 x 60 fps video in a compact camera.  stick with canon or Nikon for pictures...

Reviews.Title: Would have ordered the TX 66
Reviews.Author: Sidath. Jayanetti. Sidath jayanetti
Reviews.Content: I was quite disappointed that there was a better model with higher pixels than the model I oredered. Is there any way I could exchange this model and pay the price difference?This will be very helpful.Will recommend the TX 66 to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: No memory card included
Reviews.Author: kcjd
Reviews.Content: I have not bought a camera in years.  The last time I bought one a very small memory card was included with the camera.  I did not realize from anything included on the camera description that there was absolutely NO memory card included.  So currently I can not even test the camera as now I am waiting for the memory card to show up.  For the amount that this camera costs, it should include a memory card so you can actually use it without buying anything else.

Reviews.Title: my brother was not impressed
Reviews.Author: Brian McGrath the Carny
Reviews.Content: Greetings fellow amazonians after dropping off presents for my sister it was time to visit my brother, p-dunkle (he's my half brother, i can't go into much detail, buy my mom had a wild time in the eighty's following around billy dee williams and drinking colt 45). So I pulled up to his house and got out as I approached the front door some guy comes bursting out and falls on the stoop. He was half naked, covered in blood and delirious I checked to make sure it wasn't my brother before the dude stumbled off down the street. I decided to enter the house even after seeing this mess not knowing what was going on. Inside the house was dark and it smelled of wet dog I creeped around the corner to find a magnum pointed at my temple. It was by brother; as soon as he saw me it was like old times again and he put down the gun and gave me a hug. I felt I had to lighten the mood a little bit so I quickly gave him his present (this camera). He opened it and was pretty impressed with constuction of the camera and how well it focused.  At this point I felt it may have been ok to ask him about what the earlier events were about, but sadly he just said it was work related and I couldnt know the details. We talked and caught up for a long while and as it started getting late so I said I was going to head back out on the road because I was going to visit my mom soon. With that p-dunkle packed up the camera and handed it back to me. He said that in his business you can not have cameras lying around because sometimes something gets captured on them that could get you in trouble. I tried to convince him to keep it anyway, but alas my brother is a workaholic and cannot break the rules for anybody. I will have to return this camera and get something else for him. He said he would like some extra ammo (I think he's a big hunter), but i think I will just by him a gift card for that.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
4X optical zoom
3.0-inch LCD
Certified waterproof, dustproof, and shockproof
Full HD 1080/60i with dual record of stills and movies
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-TX20 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD  (Pink) (2012 Model)
